Games For Change Festival

Games for Change is the leading advocate for games for social impact. For the 8th annual festival, I managed 30 hours of programming, produced the event schedule, coached speakers and oversaw the production team, designer and event staff. The Games for Change Festival is the largest gaming event in New York City and the only international event uniting “games for change” creators, the public, civil society, academia, the gaming industry and media.
